### Generated file! Edit the templates in src/templates then re-run ./make-cmake.py

set(SOURCES filter_text.cpp)

set(HEADERS filter_text.h)

add_library(filter_text MODULE ${SOURCES} ${HEADERS})

target_include_directories(filter_text PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
target_link_libraries(filter_text PUBLIC common)

set_property(TARGET filter_text PROPERTY RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
                                         ${MESHLAB_PLUGIN_OUTPUT_DIR})

set_property(TARGET filter_text PROPERTY LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY
                                         ${MESHLAB_PLUGIN_OUTPUT_DIR})

install(TARGETS filter_text DESTINATION ${MESHLAB_PLUGIN_INSTALL_DIR} COMPONENT
                Plugins)
